
pause

   The ECLiPSe session is suspended (the same as Control-Z at the top-level
loop).



Arguments

Type
   Operating System

Description
   Used to suspend the ECLiPSe session.




Resatisfiable
      No.

Fail Conditions
      None.



Examples
   
Success:
      [eclipse]: [user].
       w(X) :- write(X).
       user compiled 92 bytes in 0.02 seconds
      yes.
      [eclipse]: w(bird).
      bird
      yes.
      [eclipse]: pause.
      Stopped (signal)
      % fg                       % foreground command
      eclipse
      yes.
      [eclipse]: w(duck).
      duck
      yes.
      [eclipse]: ^D
      bye
      % eclipse
      [eclipse]: w(cow).
      calling an undefined procedure





See Also
   halt / 0
